hero.title: Onye Mmepụta Ngwa iOS
hero.subtitle: Ịmepụta ahụmịhe mkpanaka ọhụrụ maka iPhone, iPad na Mac

apps.title: Ngwa Anyị
apps.subtitle: Chọpụta mkpokọta ngwa iOS ọhụrụ anyị

about.title: Banyere Push the Button Productions
about.description: Anyị bụ ndị mmepụta iOS nwere mmasị nke raara onwe ha nye ịmepụta ahụmịhe mkpanaka pụrụ iche. Ngwa anyị jikọtara teknụzụ ọhụrụ na nhazi nke nghọta iji nye ihe ngwọta na-eme ka ndụ kwa ụbọchị dị mma.

footer.description: Ịmepụta ngwa iOS ọhụrụ na-eme ka ndụ kwa ụbọchị dị mma.
